mapper.select: SELECT gcd.id AS id, gcd.group_code AS groupCode, gcd.group_code_name AS groupCodeName, gcd.description AS description, gcd.use_yn AS useYn, gcd.reg_date AS regDate FROM board_ex.tb_codegroup gcd ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_ex.tb_codegroup ( group_code, group_code_name, description, use_yn, reg_date ) VALUE ( #{groupCode}, #{groupCodeName}, #{description}, #{useYn}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totCnt FROM board_ex.tb_codegroup

SELECT cdd.id AS id, cdd.group_id AS groupId, cdd.detail_code AS detailCode, cdd.detail_code_name AS detailCodeName, cdd.description AS description, cdd.use_yn AS useYn, cdd.reg_date AS regDate, gcd.id AS gid, gcd.group_code AS groupCode, gcd.group_code_name AS groupCodeName, gcd.use_yn AS useYn FROM board_ex.tb_codedetail cdd, board_ex.tb_codegroup gcd WHERE cdd.group_id = gcd.id AND group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY cdd.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_ex.tb_codedetail ( group_id, detail_code, detail_code_name, description, use_yn, reg_date ) VALUE ( #{groupId}, #{detailCode}, #{detailCodeName}, #{description}, #{useYn}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE board_ex.tb_codedetail SET group_id = #{groupId}, detail_code = #{detailCode}, detail_code_name = #{detailCodeName}, description = #{description}, use_yn = #{useYn} WHERE id = #{id}
